name: Matthew Hank Bennett
description: Matt Bennett is an American Actor and DJ. He works in the American movies and Television series. He is known for his roles in films and shows such as The Virginity Hit, Bridesmaids, Me and Earl and the Dying Girl, The Stanford Prison Experiment, Manson Family Vacation, Victorious, The Big Bang Theory, American Vandal, and Dynasty.

name: Daniel César Martin Brühl González Domingo
description: Daniel Brühl is a German-Spanish Actor. He works in German-Spanish movies and Television shows. Daniel Brühl is famous for his works in films and TV shows such as Das Weisse Rauschen, Nichts Bereuen, Vaya con Dios, Good Bye, Lenin! The Bourne Ultimatum, The Fifth Estate, A Most Wanted Man, Rush, Captain America: Civil War, The Falcon and the Winter Soldier, The Alienist, etc.

name: Clifton Duncan Davis
description: Clifton Davis is an American Actor, Singer, and Songwriter. He wrote The Jackson 5’s number 2 hit “Never Can Say Goodbye” in 1971. Davis appeared on Broadway as Valentine in Galt MacDermot and John Guare’s musical Two Gentlemen of Verona. From 1974 to 1975, he starred as barber Clifton Curtis in the television show That’s My Mama.

name: Darren Charles Barnet
description: Darren Barnet is an American Actor. He works in American film and Television Shows. Darren Barnet is popular for his works in films and TV series such as Apophenia, Road House, Gran Turismo, Love Hard, Untitled Horror Movie, Agents of SHIELD, Never Have I Ever, Family Reunion, SWAT, Criminal Minds, This Is Us, etc.

name: Alan John Buckley
description: A. J. Buckley is a Canadian Actor. He works in American Movies and Television Shows. A. J. Buckley is famous for his works in films and TV series such as Home Sweet Hell, Skateland, The Box, The Last Sin Eater, Walking Tall: The Payback, Happy Feet, Jimmy and Judy, Blue Car, Girl Fever, The Forsaken, SEAL Team, Pure, Murder in the First, CSI: NY, North of 60, The X-Files, etc.

name: Michael Eric Reid
description: Michael Eric Reid is an American Actor. He works in American movies and Television series. He is known for his roles in films and shows such as Camp Cold Brook, The Honor Farm, Mamaboy, The Funhouse Massacre, House of D, Fame, Paradise City, Sam & Cat, Modern Family, iCarly, and Workaholics.

name: Atticus Ronald Shaffer
description: Atticus Shaffer is an American Actor. He works in American movies and Television series. He is known for his roles in films and shows such as Opposite Day, The Unborn, An American Carol, Hancock, The Middle, Fish Hooks, Steven Universe, The Lion Guard, Pete the Cat, Harvey Girls Forever, and Firebuds.

name: Chonlathit Yodprathum
description: Nadech Kugimiya is a Thai Actor and Model. He works in Thai Movies and Television Shows. Nadech Kugimiya is famous for his works in films and TV series such as Death Whisperer, The Con-Heartlist, Death Whisperer 2, Nakee 2, Chai Khang Chao, Doctor Detective, Lai Kinnaree, My Love from the Star, The Crown Princess, Lehy Lub Salub Rang, Game Rai Game Rak, Torranee Ni Nee Krai Krong, etc.

name: David Robert Dawson
description: David Dawson is a British Actor. He works in British-American Movies and Television Shows. David Dawson is famous for his works in films and TV series such as The Road to Coronation Street, Luther, Ripper Street, The Last Kingdom, The Secret Agent, Year of the Rabbit, My Policeman, The Life and Adventures of Nicholas Nickleby, Comedians, Luise Miller, and Posh.

name: Peyton Alex Smith
description: Peyton Alex Smith is an American Actor and Rapper. He works in American movies and Television series. He is known for his roles in films and shows such as Carter High, Detroit, All American: Homecoming, All American, BMF, Legacies, Tales, The Quad, Luke Cage, and Barney & Friends.
